bug.short_desc: Possible bug with the Grow layout

long_desc.thetext:
I was looking at the demo of the tabview layout. I noticed that in the demo each of the pages were using a VBox layout. Considering there is only one child widget I changed it to use the Grow layout thinking it would be more efficient but for some reason the child in the page widget (in the example it is just a label) does not grow to fill the parent but in the VBox layout it does!
More info is found in the mailing list -> http://qooxdoo.678.n2.nabble.com/Grow-layout-random-question-about-how-it-works-td5653946.html
Playground example -> http://tinyurl.com/26hmz4k
to Chris, as you are currently involved in discussing this on the mailing list.

From Chris in the same thread: "The problem here is that the label doesn't allow growing, that's the reason why the TabView shrinks. So using only a label in a grow layout doesn't work: http://tinyurl.com/2wkd688"
So setting it to invalid.
